https://tmrev.io/movie/474990-Christmas Festival of Ice 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/iTCaI6r7xSDVnmxF3qPmHlr2Bag.jpg A young woman faces her future as a lawyer in a small New England town where the annual Christmas ice sculpting competition in which she and her father have always competed has been cancelled. Working to save the festival, she meets a reluctant sculptor who reignites her passion, in more ways than one. Christmas Festival of Ice
